data: In Florence, a rich and famous city of Italy in the province called Tuscany, there lived two gentlemen of wealth and quality, Anselmo and Lothario, such great friends that by way of distinction they were called by all that knew them “The Two Friends.”
Florence | Italy | Tuscany | The Two Friends

In Florence, a rich and famous city of Italy in the province called Tuscany, there lived two gentlemen of wealth and quality, Anselmo and Lothario, such great friends that by way of distinction they were called by all that knew them "The Two Friends."
The History of Don Quixote, Volume 1, Part 13
Cervantes Saavedra, Miguel de, 1547-1616; Doré, Gustave, 1832-1883 [Illustrator]; Ormsby, John, 1829-1895 [Translator]
